prompts: Create a dragon-like Pokemon that has powerful black wings and glowing blue accents.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of electricity and darkness.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a majestic creature with a sleek body and fierce expression.
Imagine a mythical creature that harnesses the power of storms with its electric attacks.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon that stands tall and commands the battlefield with its presence.
Give me a black-colored Pokemon with striking blue energy emanating from its body.
Make a Pokemon that has a unique blend of dark and electric attributes, showcasing its power.
